scripts.config-sg-prod: cpy environments/config/sg-prod/.env environments/config/ --cwd=src && npm run jetify
scripts.config-sg-uat: cpy environments/config/sg-test/.env environments/config/ --cwd=src && npm run jetify
scripts.config-my-prod: cpy environments/config/my-prod/.env environments/config/ --cwd=src && npm run jetify
scripts.config-my-uat: cpy environments/config/my-test/.env environments/config/ --cwd=src && npm run jetify
scripts.emulate-android-sg-prod: npm run config-sg-prod && ionic cap run android --configuration=sg-prod
scripts.emulate-android-sg-uat: npm run config-sg-uat && ionic cap run android --configuration=sg-test
scripts.emulate-android-my-prod: npm run config-my-prod && ionic cap update android && ionic cap run android --configuration=my-prod
scripts.emulate-android-my-uat: npm run config-my-uat && ionic cap update android && ionic cap run android --configuration=my-test
scripts.emulate-ios-sg-prod: npm run config-sg-prod && ionic cap run ios --configuration=sg-prod
scripts.emulate-ios-sg-uat: npm run config-sg-uat && ionic cap run ios --configuration=sg-test
scripts.emulate-ios-my-prod: npm run config-my-prod && ionic cap update android && ionic cap run ios --configuration=my-prod
scripts.emulate-ios-my-uat: npm run config-my-uat && ionic cap update android && ionic cap run ios --configuration=my-test
scripts.android-sg-uat-lr: npm run config-sg-uat && ionic cap run android --configuration=sg-test --livereload --target=Pixel_3_API_29
